name: HealthWay
description: For HR managers and employees to manage their annual required healthcheck in Japan

name: PlayerWon
description: For gamers to find coaches and e-sport coaches to find students

name: Movie Watch List
description: [Under revision] An old-school cinema-feel movie watch list app. Users search for movies and add them to their watch list.

name: Line Chatbot
description: [Under revision] Chat on Line with Pikachu. Under development to incorporate ChatGPT.

name: Health Management Diagram
description: Companies in Japan are legally required to ensure a safe and healthy work environment. The interactive diagram shows health management requirements based on company's size and industry.
